channel.title: Help! plz!
channel.description: Everytime i try logging into moparscape it says, "Error, Private Server is offline click cancel and start your own have fun" and i do that and it wont work.....plz help? Im new at moparscape do i need to download it?

item.title: Help! plz!
item.dc:creator: @rick_ro rick ro$$
item.description:
@rick_ro wrote:

OK. you can download the client if you want and the reason it says that is because either the server you are trying to log into is down or updating/restarting
or your on the wrong port alway check port and your spelling because i’ve seen some situations where it was because of misspelling.

Read full topic

item.title: Help! plz!
item.dc:creator: @crakaman crakaman
item.description:
@crakaman wrote:

Well for one make sure in the Server Ip: you have in 127.0.0.1 if your trying to connect to the moparscape private server which is the click cancel than Start server does or it could be under file>New port you might have changed it change it to 43594 two problems you might have try them

Read full topic
